ea03c1eca4f4843d18fa28fa8e577b5c.sentence: 4mp , 4x optical zoom , takes absolutely beautiful photo with detail that challenge all of the above 5mp camera , easy to understand and use ( has a great swivel lcd screen ) , a lot of feature and add-on option , comes with great software ( not to be overlooked ) , and last but by far not least , received my fiance 's stamp of approval ( two thumb up ! )
